translation.en: Are you gonna throw up? Do you want me to pull over?
translation.zh: 你要吐吗？要不要我靠边停车？

translation.en: Shouldn't I be over morning sickness by now?
translation.zh: 我不是应该已经过了孕吐期吗？

translation.en: I mean, every woman's body is different, right?
translation.zh: 毕竟每个女人的身体情况不一样

translation.en: Oh, yeah? What do you know about women's bodies?
translation.zh: 噢？你对女人的身体有什么了解？
-到圣迭戈只剩一半路程了-我知道

translation.en: [sighs] It's just been hard to know for sure.
Dad must think I'm an idiot.
[sighs] Look, Beck, I know it's not in your nature to put yourself first,
translation.zh: 听着 小贝 我了解你的天性你不会首先考虑自己

translation.en: but in this case, I don't think you should take Mom and Dad's feelings into account.
translation.zh: 但在这件事情上 我认为你不应该顾虑爸妈的想法

translation.en: I don't think you should take my feelings into account.
translation.zh: 我认为你不应该顾虑我的想法

translation.en: I don't think you should even take the baby's needs into account.
translation.zh: 我认为你甚至不应该顾虑宝宝的需要

translation.en: Guess I'll have another 1,500 miles to decide, right?
translation.zh: 反正我还有2400公里的路程可以考虑

translation.en: -Let's just get back on the road and... -[boy] Help!
-...not worry about any of this. -Did you hear that?
translation.zh: -…别操心这些事情-你听到了吗？

translation.en: Sounds like he's really in trouble.
[boy] I've been trying to get to the road, -but I can't find it! -[sighs]
translation.zh: 我想回到公路上但我找不到路在哪里！

translation.en: Careful. Don't slide down into that ditch.
Watch your arm. I'm gonna pull this thing off the side of the road.
translation.zh: 小心你的手臂我把车停得离路边远点

translation.en: Hey, kid, can you hear me?
translation.zh: 喂 孩子 你能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: I've been stuck in here for days!
There's a woman in there with him. She's being weird.
translation.zh: 里面还有个女人和他一起 她怪怪的

translation.en: Kid, you're right next to us. Can you see the road?
translation.zh: 孩子 你就在我们旁边你能看到公路吗？
不 我什么都看不到！
卡尔队长 解危救困！

translation.en: -[Tobin] Yes! Please hurry! -[voice recording] Emergency services.
translation.zh: -这是你的名字吧？托宾？-对 -紧急服务热线-拜托你快一点

translation.en: -Please stay on the line. -[Tobin] I'm tired!
[Cal] Okay, Tobin, listen to me. Just sit tight. We're gonna come to you.
translation.zh: 好的 托宾 听我的话 坐着别动我们过去找你
你好 我现在在400号公路上

translation.en: [Becky] I don't know the town name, but there's a kid lost in the grass.
translation.zh: 我不知道这里是什么镇不过有个小孩在草丛里迷路了
托宾！ 我完全迷路了！

translation.en: I lost the 911 chick. Is your phone working?
translation.zh: 我打911的时候断线了你的手机能用吗？

translation.en: No, I left my phone in the car.
Please, keep coming. I can't find you.
translation.zh: 请一直往这边过来 我找不到你

translation.en: Kid, you sound like you're headed for Nebraska. Stay still!
translation.zh: 孩子 你的声音听着像是朝内布拉斯加去了 留在原地！

translation.en: I don't care how scared you are, don't move. Let us come to you.
translation.zh: 不管你有多害怕 别动 我们去找你

translation.en: Becky, where the hell are you?
translation.zh: 贝奇 你到哪里去了？

translation.en: Something's not right about this. I think we should head back to the road.
translation.zh: 这件事不对劲 我们应该回到公路上

translation.en: What about the kid and his mom?
translation.zh: 那孩子和他妈妈怎么办？

translation.en: Let's just get back together first.
I'll keep talking and you work your way back towards me, okay?
translation.zh: 我会一直说话 你朝着我的方向往回走 知道了吗？

translation.en: [Becky] What do you talk about when you're lost in a field?
translation.zh: 在草地里迷路时应该聊什么？

translation.en: [Cal] Thousands of miles of gabbing, and you can't think of anything to say?
translation.zh: 你叨叨了几千里现在不知道该说什么？

translation.en: There once was a guy named McSweeney
Who spilled some gin on his weenie
translation.zh: 他洒了琴酒 淋到了鸡鸡

translation.en: Just to be couth, he added vermouth
translation.zh: 为了当个绅士 他又加了味美思

translation.en: And slipped his girl a martini
translation.zh: 给女朋友调了一份马天尼”

translation.en: [Tobin] Hey, you guys, are you looking for me? I'm scared!
translation.zh: 喂 你们在找我吗？我很害怕！
我们在找 你再等等

translation.en: There once was a woman named Jill
They found her vagina in North Carolina--
translation.zh: 炸飞了她的粑粑 落到北卡罗来纳…”

translation.en: Aah! Stop, stop. I overshot you somehow.
translation.zh: 停下 我们不知怎么错过了

translation.en: [Becky] Cal, quit fucking around. This isn't funny.
translation.zh: 卡尔 别胡闹 这不是在开玩笑

translation.en: You're right, there's something wrong here.
translation.zh: 你说得对 这个地方有问题

translation.en: All right, let's just do this.
On the count of three, we both jump with our hands raised in the air.
translation.zh: 我数到三 然后我们同时举手跳起来

translation.en: [Becky] Yeah, of course I can jump. What do you think?
translation.zh: 我当然能跳 你觉得这行吗？

translation.en: I think you're gonna have a baby this summer, that's what I think.
translation.zh: 我觉得你这个夏天就要生了

translation.en: [Becky] Yeah. Yeah, you did. You must have! You still are.
translation.zh: 有 你动了 你肯定动了！你还在动

translation.en: I'm not. I swear I'm not.
Forget it. Let's just do this.
translation.zh: 不管了 我们就这么办

translation.en: This is nuts! This is fucking nuts!
translation.zh: 这真是荒唐！真他妈荒唐！

translation.en: [Becky] Cal? Are you okay? What is it?
I'm getting a little freaked out here.
[groans] We're gonna get out of here.
We just need to keep our heads.

translation.zh: -那孩子怎么办？-别管那孩子了

translation.en: [Cal] Beck, just stay where you are, okay? Don't move.
translation.zh: 听着 小贝 你留在原地 好吗？别动

translation.en: It's okay, Cal. This is Tobin's daddy.
translation.zh: 没事的 卡尔 我是托宾的爸爸

translation.en: If you wanna get out of here, come with me.
translation.zh: 如果你想出去 就跟我走

translation.en: If you could get out, why are you still in?
translation.zh: 如果你能出去那你为什么还在这里？

translation.en: I'm looking for my boy and my wife. They're lost in here, too.
translation.zh: 我在找我儿子和妻子他们也在这里面迷路了

translation.en: Look, it's gonna be dark soon. We should stick together.
translation.zh: 听着 天快黑了 我们应该待在一起

translation.en: I understand. You don't know me from Adam.
translation.zh: 我明白 你根本不认识我

translation.en: Ross Humbolt's the name. Real estate's the game. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我叫罗斯·亨堡 地产经纪
家在波基普西 妻子娜塔莉 儿子托宾
你哥哥 我会去找的 嗯

translation.en: Not like walking a straight line, though. Nothing is around here.
translation.zh: 但并不是直路一条 这里没有直路

translation.en: Just follow me, but stay close.
translation.zh: 跟着我走 不要离得太远

translation.en: Whatever you do, don't lose sight of me, okay?
translation.zh: 无论如何 别让我离开你的视线 好吗？

translation.en: Hang tight, Cal. We're coming for ya.
translation.zh: 别动 卡尔 我们去找你了

translation.en: But it's easier once they're dead.
The field doesn't move dead things around.
did you lure us in here?
translation.zh: 是你把我们引进来的吗？

translation.en: How long have you been in here?
How do you know she's my sister?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道她是我妹妹？

translation.en: The rock teaches you to hear the tall grass.
translation.zh: 石头会教你听懂高草说的话

translation.en: you must know where she is.
I can find out for you.
I can do better than that.
Do you wanna check on her?
I remember when Natalie was pregnant.
translation.zh: 我还记得娜塔莉怀孕的时候

translation.en: Enjoy your baby, because it goes fast.
translation.zh: 享受和宝宝一起的时光因为它转瞬即逝

translation.en: If there's one thing I know for certain,
translation.zh: 有一件事是我确信不疑的

translation.en: The sooner we get to them, the better.

translation.zh: 等等 托宾 等一下
过来 卡尔 你试试

translation.en: You'll never find her that way.
I'm trying to find these two.
[man on radio] ...south breezes today, we've certainly been warming up.
translation.zh: …今天吹轻微的南风近来气温有了明显提高

translation.en: That is about to change as another cold front
translation.zh: 但天气即将变化 因为另一个冷锋

translation.en: moves in late tonight into the morning.
translation.zh: 将于今天夜间到明天早晨过境

translation.en: Ahead of that, clouds increase tonight.
translation.zh: 在此之前 今晚云量将有所增多

translation.en: Humidity level creeps up just a little bit,
and that helps to kind of set the stage for some drizzle, possibly,
translation.zh: 可能会因此在星期二 为东部和东南部的各县带来小雨

translation.en: across especially eastern and southeastern counties for your Tuesday.
translation.zh: 为东部和东南部的各县带来小雨

translation.en: Considering this time of year, abnormally cool.
translation.zh: 而是这个季节的异常低温
不过今天也是异常温暖

translation.en: The people who are stuck in here.
But they're not connected to us, so... doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 不过他们和我们没有联系所以无所谓

translation.en: -Look, kid, we've never met before. I'm-- -Travis.
translation.zh: -听着 孩子 我们从没见过面 我是…-查维斯

translation.en: How do you know my name? You're looking for Becky.
translation.zh: -你怎么知道我的名字？-你在找贝奇

translation.en: Wait, how's that even... Who the hell are you?
translation.zh: 等等 这到底… 你到底是谁？

translation.en: Look, do you know where she is?
translation.zh: 我问你 你知道她在哪里吗？

translation.en: Look at me! Where is she?
-Are you sure you wanna see her? -Of course! Just...
translation.zh: -你确定你要见她？-当然了！只要…

translation.en: [Tobin] The field doesn't move dead things.
It makes them easier to find.
[sobbing] Oh, my God. Oh, my God, oh, my...
[woman] Well, we don't know whose car it is...
translation.zh: 我们不知道那辆车是谁…

translation.en: -Hello! -[Ross] Tobin, keep an eye on Freddy.
translation.zh: -喂！-托宾 看着弗雷迪 好吗？

translation.en: What, you... you don't remember me now?
translation.zh: 怎么？你现在不记得我了？

translation.en: Over there, Mommy. Do you hear him?
translation.zh: 在那边 妈妈 你听到他说话了吗？
什么？在哪里 亲爱的？
-没关系 弗雷迪 别去-你去哪里了？救命！

translation.en: -Get out! Get somebody. -We'll close when I get back next week.
translation.zh: 我下星期初回去然后就把单子结了 好吗？

translation.en: -No. No, no, no. I'm telling you. -[Tobin] Freddy!
Don't back out of escrow. -You're not overpaying. -Tobin! Damn it!
translation.zh: 别取消托管合同 好吗？再说我给你的价格并不高

translation.en: [Ross] Toby, stay close. Don't go in there, it's private property.
translation.zh: 托宾 别走远了别进那里面 那是私人地界

translation.en: [Ross] Toby, don't worry about Freddy. Just come back to us.
translation.zh: 托比 别管弗雷迪了 回到我们这里
托宾 你在哪里？亲爱的

translation.en: If you're still outside the grass, don't come back in here!
translation.zh: 如果你还在草丛外面 不要再进来！

translation.en: [Ross] Tobin Humbolt, didn't you hear your mother? Come back here!
translation.zh: 托宾·亨堡 听到你妈的话了吗？回来这里！

translation.en: [Natalie] Honey, can you see him? -Where is he? -[Tobin] Over here!
translation.zh: -亲爱的 你能看到他吗？他在哪里？-这边！

translation.en: -[Ross] Sounds like he's in front of us. -Are you Tobin's dad?
translation.zh: -他好像就在我们前面-你是托宾的爸爸？

translation.en: [Ross] Yeah. Who are you? What's going on?
translation.zh: 是的 你是谁？这是怎么回事？

translation.en: -Don't come in here! -[Ross] Little late for that, buddy.
translation.zh: -别进来！-已经进来了 伙计
亲爱的 我开始害怕了

translation.en: That guy, though, I'm not so sure about.
Toby, don't let that man get near you, okay? Don't talk to him.
translation.zh: 托宾 别让那人靠近你 好吗？不要跟他说话

translation.en: If you see him, you run.
translation.zh: 如果看到他 你就跑

translation.en: [Natalie] Did you hear that? He went right by us.
translation.zh: 你听到了吗？他刚刚从我们旁边经过

translation.en: Okay. Okay, Rossy boy. Hold it together.
translation.zh: 好吧 罗斯 保持冷静

translation.en: Stay positive. That's what's gonna get you out of this.
translation.zh: 保持乐观 只有这样才能出去

translation.en: It's gonna get you out of this.
"Mind that's light sells right." Right? "The mind that's light sells right."
translation.zh: 不急不迫 生意好做…”

translation.en: Right? "The mind that's light sells right. The mind that's light sells right.
Fuck. This fucking kid. Fucking kid.
Maybe if your mother acted like a mother for once, kept an eye on you.
translation.zh: 你妈就不能有个当妈的样子 看好你

translation.en: - I'm lost in here! -[Becky] Sounds like he's in trouble.
translation.zh: -我在这里面迷路了-他好像遇到了大麻烦

translation.en: -I've been trying to get to the road... -[Cal sighs] ...but I can't find it!
translation.zh: 我想回到公路上但我找不到路在哪里！

translation.en: [Cal] Careful. Don't slide down into that ditch.
translation.zh: 小心 别滑到沟里 小心你的手臂

translation.en: Watch your arm. I'm gonna pull this thing off the side of the road.
translation.zh: 小心 别滑到沟里 小心你的手臂 我把车停得离路边远点

translation.en: [Becky at a distance] There once was a man named McSweeney
Who spilled some gin on his weenie
translation.zh: 他洒了琴酒 淋到了鸡鸡

translation.en: Just to be couth, he added vermouth And slipped his girl a martini
translation.zh: 为了当个绅士 他又加了味美思给女朋友调了一份马天尼”

translation.en: [Tobin] Hey, you guys, are you looking for me? I'm scared!
translation.zh: 喂 你们在找我吗？我很害怕！
我们在找 你再等等

translation.en: [Becky] There once was a woman named Jill...
They found her vagina in North Carolina--
translation.zh: 炸飞了她的粑粑 落到北卡罗来纳…”
停下 我们不知怎么错过了
卡尔 你在草丛里吗？
贝奇 是我 查维斯！

translation.en: [Becky] How... How the hell did you get here?
[Travis] I don't know, but I'm here.
translation.zh: 我不知道 总之我在这里

translation.en: Why? Why the fuck are you here?
translation.zh: 为什么？你他妈为什么会在这里？

translation.en: But how did you get here before us?
translation.zh: 等等 你怎么会比我们先到？

translation.en: [Travis] I don't know. But it doesn't matter now.
translation.zh: 我不知道 但是这不重要

translation.en: Okay, just stay where you are.
translation.zh: 好的 呆在那里别走开

translation.en: Do you hear that? Becky? Cal?
translation.zh: 你们听到了吗？贝奇？卡尔？

translation.en: Yeah, but we already tried that.
translation.zh: 听到了 但这个办法我们已经试过了

translation.en: [Travis] Well, this time, I think it might.
translation.zh: 这次我觉得可能会有用
顺着托宾的声音走 好吗？

translation.en: There once was a man named McSweeney
Who spilled some gin on his weenie?
translation.zh: 他洒了琴酒 淋到了鸡鸡？

translation.en: He put something on his weenie
translation.zh: “他洒了什么东西 淋了鸡鸡

translation.en: Uh... And then slipped his girl a martini?
translation.zh: 然后给女朋友调马天尼？”

translation.en: And that's a dirty rhyme, not for kids.
translation.zh: 这首诗很污 少儿不宜

translation.en: What the fuck is going on?
translation.zh: 这他妈到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: Name one thing in here that does.
translation.zh: 这里有什么是合常理的？

translation.en: So, explain to us again how you got here.
translation.zh: 再跟我们说说 你是怎么来的

translation.en: You must have been right on our asses the whole way.
translation.zh: 这么说你一路紧紧跟在我们后面

translation.en: Oh, no, no. I came after.
translation.zh: 不是 我是之后才来的

translation.en: you didn't show up in San Diego.
translation.zh: 你们一直没到圣迭戈 那之后

translation.en: We just left two days ago.
No, it was longer than that. It was more like... two months.
translation.zh: 远远不止 不如说是…两个月

translation.en: Now, that really doesn't make any sense.
translation.zh: 现在这真的完全不合常理

translation.en: I think we have to focus on how the hell we get out.
translation.zh: 我想我们应该把重点放在怎么出去

translation.en: Well, I'm not making Becky blindly walk through Wonderland anymore.
translation.zh: 我不会再让贝奇盲目漫游奇境

translation.en: -We need some kind of plan. -Well, we can't just sit here.
translation.zh: -我们要有个方案-我们不能干坐在这里

translation.en: -I think we have to get moving. -[Becky] Yeah.
No, I agree. Let's just go.

translation.zh: 为什么？这样有什么意思？

translation.en: The point is I don't want to stay here.
translation.zh: 意思就是我不想留在这里

translation.en: Do you see anything other than grass?
translation.zh: 你除了草还能看到什么？

translation.en: No, I can't tell. It's too far away.
translation.zh: 我看不清楚 太远了
好吧 是哪边？ 那边

translation.en: [Cal] So, you saw our car at the church and you didn't call anybody?
translation.zh: 你在教堂看到了我们的车但你没打电话给任何人？
没有 卡尔 我没打

translation.en: I don't suppose you, um, told anyone where you were headed, did you?
translation.zh: 我猜你也没告诉别人你要去哪里

translation.en: Not that it'll make much difference.

translation.zh: 你们家的人都担心死了

translation.en: What could they do? You ask me, I don't think anyone's coming.
translation.zh: 他们能怎么办？我觉得没人会来

translation.en: everyone thought I was crazy for trying.
translation.zh: 每个人都以为我是疯了才会想试试

translation.en: Yeah. It's been a while since I checked.
Didn't wanna wait to find out.
Ginny is what I'm calling her.
For now, anyways, after my great aunt Virginia.
translation.zh: 只是暂时 用的是我姨奶奶的名字她叫维吉妮亚

translation.en: Lively is the word for it.
[Becky over phone] Don't let Cal hurt Travis!
Or else we're gonna keep making the same mistake!
translation.zh: 否则我们会永远不停犯同样的错误！

translation.en: One more reason to keep moving.
translation.zh: 再次证明我们不能停下

translation.en: Hey! Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
It's probably just her condition and a touch of heatstroke. That's all.
translation.zh: 应该只是因为她的身体状况还有点中暑 没什么的
你是罗斯 托宾的爸爸

translation.en: Hey, don't worry. Your mother, she's out there.
translation.zh: 嘿 别担心 你妈妈也在这里面

translation.en: We're gonna find her, and then we're leaving.
translation.zh: 我们会找到她 然后就离开

translation.en: Yeah, I got to the road, but I wasn't gonna leave without my family.
translation.zh: 嗯 我回到公路了但我不会抛下我的家人离开

translation.en: Well, it's not a straight line. I can say that much.
translation.zh: 不是直路一条 这是一定的

translation.en: -Which way were you headed? -Towards that building.
translation.zh: -你们在朝哪个方向走？-向着那幢建筑

translation.en: [Travis] All right, come on. Up on my shoulders, Tobin.
translation.zh: 好的 走吧 骑我的肩膀 托宾

translation.en: [Ross] That's the way things work around here.
But I got the golden ticket, for any takers.
translation.zh: 不过我有黄金通行券 来者有份

translation.en: Let me guess. Lead singer in a band?
translation.zh: 我猜猜 你是乐队主唱？

translation.en: Four-piece, with a weekly gig at the local?
translation.zh: 四人乐队 每个周末在本地演出？

translation.en: I'm a good judge of people. You gotta be, in my field.
translation.zh: 我看人很准 做这行的不会看人就只能吃草
是啊 我是做房地产的

translation.en: We were on a little family vacay through the heartland.
It was going pretty well till we ran into you.
translation.zh: 本来很顺利 直到碰到你

translation.en: I'm just giving you a hard time, that's all.
translation.zh: 我只是揶揄一下 没别的意思

translation.en: I know it's not your fault.
You know, believe it or not, before I ended up here,
translation.zh: 信不信由你 在我来到这里之前

translation.en: before, uh, real estate was my game,
translation.zh: 在我进入房地产行业之前

translation.en: Me and my Gibson and Jesus were gonna rock the world.
translation.zh: 我和我的吉普森吉他还有耶稣一起 本来要征服世界

translation.en: But, you know, got married and had a kid, and...
translation.zh: 但后来 结了婚 有了孩子…

translation.en: Still, nothin', but nothin' compares to this.
translation.zh: 不过 所有的一切都比不上这个

translation.en: [Ross] Oh, I think it's a safe bet it's been here
since before the Kiowa hunted on the Osage Cuestas.
translation.zh: 它的历史比基奥瓦人来到欧萨奇科维斯塔狩猎还要早

translation.en: Probably was here before the glaciers came and carried the hills away.
translation.zh: 也许在冰河把群山冲走之前它就已经存在了

translation.en: You realize we're in the center of the contiguous United States.
translation.zh: 你们知道吗？这里是美国本土的中心

translation.en: Smack-dab in the middle of the continent.
Ah, hell, I'd hazard this stone...
translation.zh: 其实 我敢说这块石头…

translation.en: is the center of the center.
We didn't come here for a goddamn sightseeing tour.
translation.zh: 我们来这里不是为了观光的

translation.en: You were gonna show us the way out.

translation.zh: 亲爱的 我已经带了

translation.en: Is there a map on it or something?
translation.zh: 上面是…有地图还是怎么着？

translation.en: Just put your hand on it and you'll know.
translation.zh: 把手放上去 你就知道了

translation.en: -Thank God you're all right. -Stay away! Stay away from us!
translation.zh: -谢天谢地你没事-别过来 别靠近我们！

translation.en: Whatever he told you, whatever he said to you, he's lying!
translation.zh: 无论他对你们说过什么他说的话都是骗人的！

translation.en: What? What are you talking about?
All I know, all I care about, is that we're finally together.
translation.zh: 我唯一知道、唯一关心的是我们终于团聚了

translation.en: Everything's gonna be all right now, honey.
translation.zh: 一切都没事了 亲爱的
怎么了 亲爱的？ 我看到…

translation.en: She was what? Just say it.
[sobs] I saw her on the ground some ways back.
translation.zh: 我之前看到她躺在地上
我看到她了 我肯定

translation.en: Mommy's just a little confused right now.
translation.zh: 妈妈现在有些神志不清

translation.en: I saw her. I saw her, and you...
translation.zh: 我看到她了 还有你…

translation.en: -How could you even think that? -[groans] We're all in this together.
translation.zh: 你怎么能这么想？我们是一起的
对吗 查维斯？我们很团结？

translation.en: Look, thanks for your help, mister, but, uh...
translation.zh: 谢谢你的帮助 先生 不过…

translation.en: I think we're gonna go our own way now...
Do you wanna come with us?
No, just a minute. Just hear me out.
translation.zh: 不 等一下 听我说

translation.en: once you touch it, you'll know.
translation.zh: 只要你碰了它 你就会知道

translation.en: I know that sounds like blasphemy, but it's true.
translation.zh: 我知道这话有点亵渎上帝但这是真的

translation.en: You think this is just chance?
translation.zh: 你们以为这一切只是偶然？

translation.en: Folks are brought into the grass for a reason.
translation.zh: 人不是无缘无故被引到草地里的

translation.en: We're all here because we've got stuff to work out.
translation.zh: 我们来到这里是因为我们都有要解决的问题

translation.en: And this rock, in its wisdom,
translation.zh: 这块石头 它的智慧

translation.en: brought our two families together to do just that.
translation.zh: 把我们两个家庭带到一起正是为了完成这个任务

translation.en: All it's asking for is a little faith.
translation.zh: 它只需要你们付出一点信仰

translation.en: Five little fingers on its face and you will be redeemed!
translation.zh: 只需五根指头 触到它的表面你们就能得到救赎！

translation.en: All your sins, all your trespasses, all your regrets will melt away
translation.zh: 你们所有的罪恶、所有的过犯所有的悔恨都会消失

translation.en: and the world will open up like a flower!
translation.zh: 世界将像鲜花一样盛开！

translation.en: You gotta trust me on this.
I think you should let her go.
Look, you don't have the advantage here.
translation.zh: 听着 你在这里不占优势

translation.en: If you think I was doing the soft sell
translation.zh: 如果你们以为我刚才的软推销

translation.en: because I was afraid of going the other way,
well, you got another think comin'.
It's better that you come to the rock on your own.
translation.zh: 你们最好自愿到石头这里来

translation.en: Open your heart to it, like I did.
translation.zh: 向它敞开心灵 和我一样

translation.en: Now, what I really wanna know...
is how did you get here?
Because the rock wouldn't let you find us unless it wanted you to.
translation.zh: 因为石头不会让你找到我们除非这是它的意愿

translation.en: When you touch that rock, you'll know everything I know.
translation.zh: 只要你碰碰石头你就会知道我知道的一切

translation.en: Everything the grass knows, including how to leave.
translation.zh: 草地知道的一切 包括出去的路
省点力气吧 孩子们

translation.en: He's right, you know? Where are we gonna go?
translation.zh: 他说得对 我们还能去哪里？

translation.en: He'll find us. For sure, he'll find us.
translation.zh: 他会找到我们 他一定会找到我们

translation.en: [Travis] Listen to me. First thing we have to do is you need to take hold of my hand.
translation.zh: 听着 首先你要抓紧我的手 好吗？
-没事的 托宾-我爸爸说得对
-没事的 托宾-我爸爸说得对 我们都是草

translation.en: We keep dying and coming back.
translation.zh: 我们不停死去 然后复活

translation.en: -I didn't know what to do. -Yeah, you sure didn't.
translation.zh: -我当时不知道该怎么办-你当然不知道

translation.en: Well, we wouldn't be in this mess if it wasn't for you.
translation.zh: 如果不是你 我们不会来到这破地方

translation.en: Okay, blaming each other isn't gonna solve anything.
translation.zh: 够了 互相指责解决不了任何问题

translation.en: Well, all indicators are that there's no way to solve this.
translation.zh: 一切迹象表明根本没有解决办法

translation.en: If we're just gonna go round and round in circles,
translation.zh: 既然我们不停在原地打转

translation.en: I'll feel a lot better saying what we all know.
translation.zh: 打开天窗说亮话会让我舒服很多

translation.en: Are you forgetting the detail that he completely abandoned you?
translation.zh: 你已经把那件小事忘了？他彻底抛弃了你？

translation.en: That he totally threw you away?
That he wanted you to abort your own baby?
translation.zh: 他要你打掉你自己的孩子？

translation.en: -I just wanted... -You just wanted to what?
I need water. I need a place to sleep.
translation.zh: 我需要水 我需要有个地方睡觉

translation.en: What I don't need is any more brotherly love.
translation.zh: 我不需要更多的兄长关爱

translation.en: But that's not the real reason you don't like me.
translation.zh: 但你讨厌我不是因为这个

translation.en: No, it's a good excuse, but it's not the reason.
translation.zh: 不 这是个好借口 但不是真正的理由

translation.en: You didn't want me around even before there was a baby.
translation.zh: 在有宝宝之前你就不希望我存在
事实是 无论我做什么

translation.en: that I could have done to make you like me,
translation.zh: 都不可能博得你的好感

translation.en: because no one is ever gonna be good enough for your little sister.
translation.zh: 因为你觉得没有人配得上你妹妹

translation.en: -A high school diploma would be nice. -You know what?
I'm not quite the fuckup that you think I am!
translation.zh: 我告诉你 我没有你想的那么混！

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no. You're a real rock star.
translation.zh: 当然没有 你可是大明星呢

translation.en: You've sacrificed everything for that ridiculous, infantile fantasy,
translation.zh: 你为了那个荒唐幼稚的幻想牺牲了一切

translation.en: and now we're all suffering for it.
translation.zh: 现在我们都在为此受难

translation.en: Playing hubby to your little sister?
That's the next best thing to fucking her, which is what you really want, isn't it?
translation.zh: 这样也不错 既然睡不了她其实你真正想的是这个吧？

translation.en: He's not gonna get through that without a sledgehammer.
translation.zh: 没有大锤 他打不开的

translation.en: I wouldn't be so sure about that.
What are we gonna do? We're stuck up here!
translation.zh: 怎么办？我们被困在屋顶了！

translation.en: No, listen to me. When I drove here, I saw this building from the road.
translation.zh: 不 听着 我开车过来的时候在路上看到了这座楼

translation.en: Yeah. The church, it was just on the other side.
translation.zh: 对 教堂就在另一边

translation.en: Only thing is, we go in that grass again and we're back to square one.
translation.zh: 唯一的问题是 我们一踏进草丛就又回到了原点

translation.en: Fucking dog gives me the creeps.
translation.zh: 天杀的狗让我起鸡皮疙瘩

translation.en: The way out? You think that's it?
Maybe. But we're not there yet--
translation.zh: 也许 但我们还没有…

translation.en: Becky, we've gotta get out of here.
translation.zh: 贝奇 我们必须出去

translation.en: Holes are everywhere, Calvin, my boy.
translation.zh: 洞到处都是 卡尔文 小伙子
-查维斯！-小贝 我们不能停！

translation.en: I'll come back for him, but we have to get you out!
translation.zh: 我会回来找他 但要先把你送出去！

translation.en: I found a way. It's... It's right there.
translation.zh: 我找到路了 就在那边

translation.en: and I'm telling you right now to forget about that asshole.
translation.zh: 我现在告诉你 忘掉那个人渣
求求你 小贝 等等

translation.en: Thought that you would lose your sister when you got out of here.
translation.zh: 你以为出去以后就会失去你妹妹

translation.en: That the baby would bring her and Travis together, you'd be left out in the cold.
translation.zh: 以为她和查维斯会因为宝宝和好把你冷落在一旁

translation.en: You're probably right on that score.
translation.zh: 你很可能猜对了 在这一点上

translation.en: Your mistake is thinking you're ever leaving.
translation.zh: 你的错误是以为你们能离开

translation.en: Of course, I was a bit of a track star back in the day.
translation.zh: 不过呢 我曾经是赛跑能手

translation.en: -[screams] -[grunts] I know. I know. I know.
You're thinking if you had just turned left instead of right,
translation.zh: 你在想如果你当时向左转而不是向右转

translation.en: you could've gotten away from me.
And you kept running and didn't turn at all.
translation.zh: 与此同时 你一直跑 根本没有转弯

translation.en: in the garden of forking paths,
translation.zh: 在这座满是岔路的花园里

translation.en: you didn't make any one choice.
translation.zh: 你作出的不是一个选择

translation.en: And they all led back to me.
I think he loves you a little too much.
I had my chance with you, and I threw it away.
translation.zh: 我曾有机会和你一起 我放弃了

translation.en: I want you to know I...
I'm glad you didn't listen to me.
translation.zh: 我很庆幸你没有听我的话
我很庆幸你保住了吉妮

translation.en: There's something I didn't tell you.
translation.zh: 有一件事我没有告诉你

translation.en: I was gonna give her up.
I didn't think I was ready to be a mom.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己还没有做好当妈妈的准备

translation.en: That's why we were, um, going to San Diego.
translation.zh: 这是我们去圣迭戈的原因

translation.en: What difference does it make now?
We're gonna get out of here.
I'm gonna find a way. Our baby deserves to live.
translation.zh: 我会找到路 我们的宝宝有权利活着

translation.en: I wish I could just touch your hand.
How funny. This is where I tussled with Natalie for the first time.
translation.zh: 真是有趣 这里是我第一次和娜塔莉争执的地方

translation.en: I tried to show her the way, but she just wouldn't listen.
translation.zh: 我想给她带路 但她不听

translation.en: You wanna touch the rock, darlin'?
You wanna lay on it naked?
translation.zh: 你想不想裸着躺在上面？
想不想我进入你的体内？

translation.en: Beneath the pinwheel stars while the grass sings our names?
translation.zh: 在星轮的照耀下草地歌唱我们的名字？

translation.en: but tears are better for an old, thirsty rock like that.
translation.zh: 但对于这样一块古老、干渴的石头眼泪更好

translation.en: -It has to be quick, though. -[thunder rumbling]
Don't wanna do it in front of the kid.
Or else we're gonna keep making the same mistakes forever.
translation.zh: 否则我们会永远不停犯同样的错误！

translation.en: -No, not too fast. -[gulps] I don't want you to get sick.
translation.zh: 别太急 我不希望你反胃

translation.en: -May I have a look? My baby? -It's okay.
Out of the oven and baked just right.
translation.zh: 新鲜出炉 完美制作
你就像圣母玛利亚一样

translation.en: Wonder when the Wise Men will come.
translation.zh: 不知道三智者什么时候会到

translation.en: I wonder what gifts they'll have for us.
translation.zh: 不知道他们会带来什么贺礼

translation.en: [Cal] There once was a farmer from Leeds
Who swallowed a bag full of seeds
Cows do it all the time.

translation.zh: 这样的事永远不会停止

translation.en: He's gonna keep killing us over...
I'm not gonna let him hurt you.
But he's watching us right now.
Your honey took my eye out.

translation.zh: 在这里 眼睛只会迷惑人

translation.en: Too bad, kid. I liked ya.
translation.zh: 可惜了 孩子 我挺喜欢你的

translation.en: Saw a seed of myself in there.
translation.zh: 我在你身上看到了我自己

translation.en: was to help you find redemption.
God knows you're the one who needed it the most.
translation.zh: 神知道 最需要救赎的是你
别让他们进来 托宾

translation.en: Sounds like he's really in trouble.
I've been trying to get to the road, -but I can't find it! -[sighs]
translation.zh: 我想回到公路上但我找不到路在哪里！

translation.en: Stay away from it. Stay away.
Get back in the car. You have to go.
translation.zh: 回到车里 你们必须离开

translation.en: -Kid, where are your parents? -It doesn't matter. Please.
translation.zh: -孩子 你的爸爸妈妈呢？-这不重要 拜托

translation.en: -We just have to go. Get in the car. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我们只要走就好 上车-好吧

translation.en: -[Tobin] I can't find my way out! -What do we do?
translation.zh: -我们怎么办？-我找不到出去的路

translation.en: I mean, it sure sounds like he's in trouble.
translation.zh: 他好像真的遇到了大麻烦

translation.en: No. No! No, don't let him go in!
If he goes in, you'll go in and you'll never get out.
translation.zh: 如果他进去 你也会进去你们就永远出不来了

translation.en: He said he got this from Travis.
translation.zh: 他说这是查维斯给他的
我会解释的 我保证

translation.en: But right now, we have to go. Please.
translation.zh: 但现在我们必须离开 拜托

translation.en: You've gotta help me get out of here!
-That's back the way we came. -Yeah, I know.
I thought we said we were gonna go on.
translation.zh: 我们不是决定往前走吗？

translation.en: What about that family in San Diego?
I have my own family now.
translation.zh: 我现在有自己的家庭了

translation.en: ♪ By the way she wears her apron ♪ ♪ And the clothes she wore ♪
